Articles.Content:
First off... If this has ben answered b4 please feel free to redirect me twards the answer!

Ok so i just got 0.20 ver of KSP and i'm in the VAB building my entire space station... But i'm making it so i can decouple it and send it up piece by piece into space then build it up in space Fallow me so far?

Next i want to delete the usless parts that i will not send into space on this trip and keep only the modual that i will send up.

Next i want to load a previously built rockette or space shuttle and put the station part in the cargo bay or fairings....

Is there a way in this version to do so? And if not is there a mod to do so? and if not will the game incorporate this feature? thanks

Edited May 23, 2013 by Dermeister
This plugin will allow you to load a previously built rocket.
Just be careful with that download, as it is a quick fix until such time as the actual mod developer gets back to it and so there may be some problems with it.

Just be careful with that download, as it is a quick fix until such time as the actual mod developer gets back to it and so there may be some problems with it.

Thank you both of you for the mod and the heads up i shall read about it see if i get it or not
